title: Font Management Software options
content:
Greetings guys.

Here at work we’ve been using Linotype Fontexplorer X.  
Are there any good alternatives worth trying? \*

I’d appreciate if you could post what font management software you’re using at the moment, and why you like it.

Best Regards.  
David

\*(I’ve run a search on font management and such and found no similar thread, sorry if I’m posting something that’s been discussed already)
author: DavM

comments.content: FontMatrix; its CSS theming and tonnes of features :-)

Thanks, gonna give it a try.

David
